Paris is Burning

Posted to Mottr.am by
Jack
on 13 November 2009. Tags: documentary

For my money, Paris is Burning is one of the best documentary films ever made.

For years, it was only available on hissy nth generation VHS tapes of dubious provenance; nowadays, inevitably, you can watch the whole thing on YouTube. And you should.
